mapper.sql: FUID , ROLE_ID , MENU_ID , OPERATING_ID , CREATEDATE , CREATEUSERREALNAME , CREATEUSERID , MODIFYDATE , MODIFYUSERREALNAME , MODIFYUSERID
mapper.insert: insert into base_menu_role ( FUID , ROLE_ID , MENU_ID , OPERATING_ID , CREATEDATE , CREATEUSERREALNAME , CREATEUSERID , MODIFYDATE , MODIFYUSERREALNAME , MODIFYUSERID ) values ( #{fuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{operatingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{createuserrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{createuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{modifyuserrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{modifyuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

ROLE_ID ,
MENU_ID ,

update base_menu_role
ROLE_ID=#{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
MENU_ID=#{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
OPERATING_ID=#{operatingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

MODIFYUSERID=#{modifyuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where FUID = #{fuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update base_menu_role set ROLE_ID=#{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , MENU_ID=#{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , OPERATING_ID=#{operatingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CREATEDATE=#{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , CREATEUSERREALNAME=#{createuserrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CREATEUSERID=#{createuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , MODIFYDATE=#{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , MODIFYUSERREALNAME=#{modifyuserrealname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , MODIFYUSERID=#{modifyuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FUID = #{fuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM base_menu_role WHERE FUID IN
#{item}
mapper.select:
select
from base_menu_role where #{0} LIKE concat(cancat('%',#{1}),'%')
select op.code as operating_id, m.menu_url as menu_id,mr.* from base_menu_role mr left join base_menu m on mr.menu_id=m.fuid left join base_operating op on op.fuid=mr.operating_id
